action.action-desc: Mr. Holt submitted the following concurrent resolution; which was referred to the Committee on House Administration

form.official-title: Permitting the use of the rotunda of the Capitol for a ceremony to award the Congressional Gold Medal to Doctor Muhammad Yunus.

section.header: Use of rotunda for ceremony to award congressional gold medal to doctor muhammad yunus
section.text: The rotunda of the Capitol is authorized to be used on April 17, 2013, for a ceremony to award the Congressional Gold Medal to Doctor Muhammad Yunus in recognition of his contributions to the fight against global poverty. Physical preparations for the ceremony shall be carried out in accordance with such conditions as the Architect of the Capitol may prescribe.
